default-axis-deadzone.name: Default Axis Deadzone
default-axis-deadzone.desc: A value between 0 and 1 that determines the default deadzone for all axes

default-joystick-deadzone.name: Default Joystick Deadzone
default-joystick-deadzone.desc: A value between 0 and 1 that determines the default deadzone for all joysticks

default-control-scheme.desc: The default control scheme to use

auto-switch-control-scheme.name: Auto Switch Control Scheme
auto-switch-control-scheme.desc: Whether to automatically switch control schemes when the user inputs a new control scheme
